user_question: What are the top 5 emerging markets to invest in 2023 and generate an infographic about them?
final_answer: Top 5 emerging markets to invest in 2023: India, Vietnam, Indonesia, Brazil, and Nigeria. Infographic generated. Key economic indicators: India - GDP growth 6.5%, inflation 4.8%; Vietnam - GDP growth 7.2%, inflation 3.5%; Indonesia - GDP growth 5.1%, inflation 3.2%; Brazil - GDP growth 2.8%, inflation 5.0%; Nigeria - GDP growth 3.0%, inflation 11.5%.
